"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c31e0063687216f5990000#post_53c31e0063687216f5990000
Will we ever be able to henshin? (Generating a Combat Ready suit right onto you with the power of technology)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c31e6863687239b8640000#post_53c31e6863687239b8640000
Short answer; *NO*.  Such a suit would be highly impracticable and too costly.  The closest you'll ever see is a combat suit where it has a mechanism for quickly being put on.  Less of a transformation and more of the suit snaps on quickly.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c31ed36368725dbb0a0000#post_53c31ed36368725dbb0a0000
I figured

I would like the long answer as well

Edit: Or was that the long answer?
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c31f726368721d0deb0100#post_53c31f726368721d0deb0100
The long answer is the same reason why you will never see giant mechs on the battlefield; such a system would have too many weakpoints, they would be easy to break, would cost too much, the materials they would be made out of wouldn't be cost efficient and so forth.

The problem with a suit that transforms like like in Kamen Rider is that in all probability instead of transforming it would snap the user's spine cause of how rapidly it would change and how much force we're talking about being put into that cause let's not forget that the kamen rider suits can double as space suits.  The reason why that would be a bad idea is that NASA is currently looking at revamping space suits by instead of using air pressure to keep the astronaut pressurized using pressure of the suit to keep them instead; the reason why having a transformation mechanism with that sort of space suit is that it would break every bone in your body.

Even if you could get past the problem with how in all probability it would break every bone in the person's body the materials to make it actually strong enough to handle real world combat would be insanely fucking expensive.

It gets worse in that even if you could get past all those problems the chances of a critical failure would be too high.  What I mean by this is that a single bolt or screw breaking during a transformation would turn the user into a soup.

Tl:dr; such a suit would turn you into confetti.
